turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'll be needing two huge pizzas for a small family get-together.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! What kinds of pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two supersized ones from Domino's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You mean large? That's the biggest size I'm seeing on their menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make one a Buffalo Chicken, and the other a pepperoni for the kids.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a large Buffalo Chicken and a large pepperoni. That's all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe I'd better include a couple of breadstick orders too. And don't forget extra marinara sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Breadsticks, or cheese sticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Breadsticks are the plain ones, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Those are the ones I want, then. I guess three orders will be enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, the two large pizzas and then three orders of breadsticks with extra marinara?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exactly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the pizza types are pepperoni and Buffalo Chicken, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, done. They'll be ready to pick up in about 25 minutes, and your receipt will be sent by text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's much appreciated. Goodbye.
